YOUR PHOTOS SETUP GUIDE

To display your photos on the website, follow these steps:

1. Find your preferred photos.
2. Rename the teaching/blackboard photo to 'photo1.jpg'.
3. Rename the mirror selfie photo to 'photo2.jpg'.
4. Place both files in the 'public/images/' folder of your project.

Once done, they will automatically appear on the Homepage gallery and the About page.
